remarks: Change the bound variable of a class substitution using implicit substitution.  (Contributed by NM, 30-Sep-2008.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 13-Oct-2016.)
statement:
cbvsbcv.1 $e |- ( x = y -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
cbvsbcv $p |- ( [. A / x ]. ph <-> [. A / y ]. ps ) $.
$d ph y $.
$d ps x $.
